SA19n1286:6: iha khalu prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo'rthijanāḥ sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusarantīti pramāṇamādau vyutpāddyate |
SA19n1286:19: nanu jñānaṃ kartṛ puruṣaṃ prayojyamartha karmabhūtaṃ yadi kadācinna prāpayati tatkathamaprāpakatvāt pramāṇaṃ syāt ? ucyate |
SA19n1286:20: na hi jñānena puruṣo gale pādukānyāyena balādarthe pravartayitavyaḥ |
SA19n1286:21: api tvevaṃbhūtamidaṃ vatusvarupaṃ nānyathetyanenākāreṇa niścayo janayitavyaḥ |
SA19n1286:24: puruṣastu tatra prayojanavaśāt pravartatāmṛte prayojanaṃ na pravartatām ,
SA19n1286:34: tato'nyad dṛṣṭamanyat prāpyata ityapratītaprāpaṇāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamasya saṃgacchatām |
SA19n1286:35: na , yadi nāma vastuto'nyadeva prāpyate tathāpi dṛṣṭameva mayā prāptamityekatvādhyavasāyāt pratītaprāpaṇamabhidhīyate |
SA19n1286:44: tathā hi- yadi nāma mandabuddhirutpattivaśādavisaṃvādakatvaṃ jñānasya nāvadhārayituṃ samarthaḥ ,
SA19n1286:45: tathāpi dāhapākāvagāhanasnānapānonmajjanāddyarthakriyāṃ dūrato'nubhavato narasya darśanenoccalad dhūmādidarśanena cāvadhārayati |
SA19n1286:48: yadyavisaṃvādalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadā śrotrajñānasyādhigatārthāprāpakatvāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamini cet ? na |
SA19n1286:57: yadi nāma tasyaiva nāsti sandeho me vartata iti tathāpi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvādyuktaḥ sandeho bhavan kena vāryate iti | tasmāt
SA19n1286:60: ata eva tu pratyakṣasya svataḥ prāmāṇyam |
SA19n1286:62: yogijñānasya svasaṃvedanasya ca svata eva prāmāṇyam |
SA19n1286:63: anumānasya tu niścayātmakatvāt svata eva pramāṇyam |
SA19n1286:65: tenāyamarthaḥ- prathamata eva yadvijñānaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ tadeva pramāṇam ,
SA19n1286:68: yathā ghaṭaṃ nirvikalpakena jñānena dṛṣṭvā paścāttasminneva viṣaye ghaṭo'yamiti savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ smaraṇarupam ,
SA19n1286:69: yathā vā parvatādau dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vahniratretyanumānajñānānantaraṃ punarapi tatraiva vahniratretyanumānajñānam |
SA19n1286:71: samyagjñānaṃ pramāṇamityukte sāmarthyājjaḍasvabhāvasyendriyādeḥ paricchedakatvābhāvāt prāmāṇyaṃ nirastam paricchedakatvaṃ hi boddhṛtvam |
SA19n1286:80: nanu yadyakṣāśritaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadā mānasādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānatrayamindriyādanutpatteḥ pratyakṣaṃ na syāt?
SA19n1286:83: tataḥ svasaṃvedanādikamapi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanarupamartha sākṣātkarotīti pratyakṣaśavdavācyaṃ siddhyatīti ||
SA19n1286:88: liṅgagrahaṇaliṅgaliṅgisambandhasmaraṇayoḥ paścāt yadvijñānaṃ parvatādau dharmiṇi parokṣavastvālambakaṃ tadevānumānaśabdenābhidhīyate |
SA19n1286:91: dvividhavacanena ekaṃ trīṇi catvāri pañca ṣaḍhiti vipratipattayo nirasyante |
SA19n1286:97: dvividhavacanena dvitve prāpte pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti punaryaduktaṃ tadanyathādvitvanirāsārtham |
SA19n1286:98: tathā hi vaiyāka raṇo brūte pratyakṣaṃ śābdaṃ ceti pramāṇadvayam ||
SA19n1286:101: tathā hi - sa khalu pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ parapratipādanāya praṇayati |
SA19n1286:107: nānumānaṃ pramāṇamiti ca bruvan kathaṃ nāma nonmattaścārvākaḥ syāt ?
SA19n1286:111: na ca śabdānāṃ bāhyārthena saha kaścitsambandho'sti |
SA19n1286:112: tathā hi - śabdārthayoḥ sambandho bhavan tādātmyaṃ tadutpattirarvā bhavet |
SA19n1286:120: tathā hi - śabdavyāpāramantareṇa svahetoreva mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍasalilakulālacakrādeḥ sakāśādutpadyamāno ghaṭādirartho dṛśyate |
SA19n1286:122: atha tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanya eva vācyāvācakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ vāstavaḥ sambandhadho'sti |
SA19n1286:123: evaṃ tarhyasaṃketavido'pi puruṣasya śabdāduccaritānniyatā - rthapratītiḥ prāptā,
SA19n1286:124: yogyatā mātreṇaiva pradīpāt ghaṭādipratītivat na caitadasti |
SA19n1286:125: tathā hi -abhinavo nālikeradvīpādāyātaḥ pumānagniśabdaṃ śrutvā'pyagniśavdānna kiñcidartha pratyetīti |
SA19n1286:126: atha tāṃstān saṃketānapekṣya tattadarthapratyāyanayogya evāyaṃ śabdo jāyata ityucyate |
SA19n1286:133: tathā ca so'pi kena sambandhena tayoḥ sambadhda iti praṣṭavyaḥ |
SA19n1286:138: athāsambaddha eva śabdārthayoḥ samvandha iti cet |
SA19n1286:140: yo na sambaddhaḥ sa kathaṃ sambandho bhavati ghaṭasyeva paṭaḥ |
SA19n1286:141: atha vaktavyaṃ sambandhasya tādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ,
SA19n1286:145: yathāgnerevāyamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvo yaduta dāhakatvaṃ nāma nānyasyākāśādeḥ |
SA19n1286:146: sambandhasiddhau tu pramāṇaṃ kiñcinnirupayanto na paśyāmaḥ |
SA19n1286:147: na caivaṃ vaktavyaṃ śabdaśaktisvabhāvādeva śabdānāṃ niyatārthāvyabhicāritvamiti |
SA19n1286:148: tathā hi - yadi ghaṭa ityayaṃ śabdaḥ svabhāvādeva kambugrīvākāraṃ vārisaṃdhāraṇasamartha padārthamabhidadhāti,
SA19n1286:150: na hi śālibījaṃ svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvamutpannaṃ saṃketāntamapekṣya gardabhaṃ janayituṃ samartha syāt |
SA19n1286:157: sarāgā api vītarāgā iva ceṣṭanta iti nyāyātkathamāptatvaṃ niścīyatāmiti |
SA19n1286:158: samvandhadūṣaṇena ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nirastamiti pṛthaṅnoktam |
SA19n1286:159: kathaṃ tarhi sarvo'yamasandigdho laukiko vyavahāra iti cet |
SA19n1286:160: tathā tathā saṃketena vivakṣāvaśāditi na kācit kṣatiḥ |
SA19n1286:164: yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam ,
SA19n1286:165: sa ca apadiṣṭaḥ svāminā araṇyaṃ gatvā gavayamānayeti |
SA19n1286:166: sa ca gavayaśabdavācyamarthamajānāno vanecaramanyaṃ tajjñaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān ,
SA19n1286:168: sa cāha yādṛśī gaustādṛśo gavaya iti |
SA19n1286:169: tasyāraṇyagatasya preṣyapuruṣasya atideśa vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ kartṛ ayamasau gavayaśabdavācyo'rtha iti pratipattiṃ falasvarupāṃ janayatpramāṇam |
SA19n1286:172: na cāsya nipuṇamapi nirupayanto viṣayaṃ saṃpaśyāmaḥ |
SA19n1286:173: tathā hi - samākhyā nāma sambandhaḥ tasya viṣayo varṇyate |
SA19n1286:177: kiṃ ca -sa hi sambandhaḥ sambadhibhyāṃ bhinno'bhinno vā |
SA19n1286:178: yadā bhinnastadā tayoḥ sambandhaḥ kena sambandheneti vācyam |
SA19n1286:184: yataḥ sambaddhāvetāviti buddhiḥ svahetubalāt sambaddhavastudvayādapi sambhāvyamānā na sambandhāntaramākṣiptuṃ prabhavati ||
SA19n1286:187: tathā hi, sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayastena varṇyate |
SA19n1286:188: na ca sadṛśavastuno'tiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
SA19n1286:190: tathā hi - yadi sadṛśādatiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyaṃ syāt tadā dṛśyānulambhagrastametat |
SA19n1286:191: athādṛśyaṃ tadā tatpratibadhdaliṅgābhāvāt anumānādapi kathaṃ tatsidhdiḥ |
SA19n1286:192: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunā'pi kriyamāṇo ghaṭata iti na tatpratyayādapi tatsiddhiryuktā |
SA19n1286:194: yataḥ pramāṇāntarasiddhayoreva sādṛśyapiṇḍaoyoryo viśeṣaṇaviṣeṣyabhāvastasyopamānaviṣayatvaṃ tena vādinā parikaldhdapyate |
SA19n1286:198: tathā hi pratyakṣādipratīto yo'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattirityarthāpatterlakṣaṇam |
SA19n1286:200: tasya yadi parikalpyamānena parokṣārthena saha kaścittādāmyalakṣaṇaḥ tadutpattilakṣaṇo va pratibandho'sti tadā svabhāvaliṅgajā kāryaliṅgajā vā'sau pratipattirityarthāpattiranumānameva |
SA19n1286:213: jñānamapi kiṃ jñānamātram ekajñānasaṃsargivastuno jñānaṃ vā ?
SA19n1286:215: tasya sarvaśaktiśūnyatvāt paricchedakatvaṃ vā kathaṃ bhavet ?
SA19n1286:222: na hi jaḍarupaṃ śakaṭādikaṃ ghaṭaṃ paricchinattīti kvāpi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ veti |
SA19n1286:230: yathā vijñapuruṣasya so'yaṃ ghaṭa iti pratītiḥ |
SA19n1286:234: nanu bālamūkādīnāmantarjalpākāraṃ kalpanājñānamastīti kuto niścetavyamiti ceta,
SA19n1286:238: bālamūkādivijñānasya kalpanātva sūcanena bhattoktālocanājñānaṃ savikalpakamiti pratipāditaṃ bhavati |
SA19n1286:239: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ kalpanāvibhramātmakaṃ ca jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na syāditi ceta ? na |
SA19n1286:240: arthasvarupasākṣākāri hi jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti sarvoṣāṃ prasiddham |
SA19n1286:243: artho hi grāhyatvāt jñānasya kāraṇam | yathoktam -
SA19n1286:244: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti cet grāhyatāṃ viduḥ |
SA19n1286:248: na hi yadantareṇāpi yadbhavati tattasya kāryam ,
SA19n1286:254: śābdyāṃ buddhāvarthasya pratyakṣa iva pratibhāsābhāvād nāsti kalpanāyā arthasākṣātkāritvam iti ||
SA19n1286:256: na so'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte |
SA19n1286:259: tathāhi - ghaṭe purovartini uccāryamāṇe tatsamīpavarti bhūtalādijñānamuccāraṇarahitamanubhūyata eva |
SA19n1286:269: etena kāmalinaḥ śukle śaṃkhe pītapratibhāsi jñānaṃ ,
SA19n1286:274: nanu yadi nāma tajjñānaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ tato vastuprāptiriti cet?
SA19n1286:278: taccaturvidhaṃ- indriyajñānaṃ mānasaṃ svasaṃdanaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti |
SA19n1286:289: idaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yatraiva svānurupaṃ vikalpaṃ janayati tatraiva pramāṇam ,
SA19n1286:300: ' gṛhītagrāhitvamandhabadhirādyabhāvo yogijñānasyāpi mānasatvaprasaṅgaḥ avyavahāritvaṃ ca ' iti |
SA19n1286:320: na kaściddoṣaḥ syādityāgamasyāpi viśuddhiranena pratipāditeti prayojanam ||
SA19n1286:327: teṣāṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmā saṃvidyate yena rupeṇa tatsvarupamātmasvarupasākṣatkāritvāt svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ cocyate |
SA19n1286:328: atra kecidāhuḥ -na ca cittacaittānāṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ ghaṭate ,
SA19n1286:330: na ca suśikṣito'pi naṭavaṭuḥ svaskandhamāroḍhuṃ śaknoti |
SA19n1286:332: na hi prajjvalito'pi vahniskandha ātmānaṃ dahati |
SA19n1286:333: tathā cittacaittamapi kathamātmānaṃ vedayatu vedyavedakabhāvo hi karmakartṛbhāvaḥ |
SA19n1286:336: atrocyate , na karmakartṛbhāvena vedyavedakatvaṃ jñāne varṇyate |
SA19n1286:338: yathā pradipa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati tathā jñānamapi jaḍapadārthavilakṣaṇaṃ svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvamupajāyamānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
SA19n1286:345: na ca cittacaittānāṃ jñānāntareṇa prakāśyatvaṃ yujyate |
SA19n1286:346: tathā hi - na tāvatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānāntareṇa cittacaittaṃ prakāśyata iti ghaṭate,
SA19n1286:352: api ca yadi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt ,
SA19n1286:360: na hi daṇḍāgrahaṇe daṇḍino grahaṇaṃ yuktisaṅgatam |
SA19n1286:366: kiṃ tarhi ? cakṣurvijñānāsaṃvedane kathaṃ jñāyatāmiti codyamakṣatameva ||
SA19n1286:377: prākaṭyasyāpi jñānāt pṛthaktve viṣayarupatāyāṃ vyaktau jaḍarupatā ,
SA19n1286:386: parokṣaṃ yadi tat jñānaṃ jñātamityeva tatkutaḥ |
SA19n1286:399: tadā svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvādutpannāḥ santaḥ prakāśanta iti svīkartavyam ||
SA19n1286:422: atrocyate - avastuviṣayo'pi vikalpo vastvadhyavasyatīti bhāvanāto vastuna evātra sphuṭībhāvaḥ |
SA19n1286:432: nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati |
SA19n1286:434: nityavādapi kiṃ tasya kastāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ ||iti ||
SA19n1286:435: yattu śarīritve sukhaduḥkhayorbhāvādanugrahanigrahāt śarīrī rāgādivirahānmukta śceti vighaṭanamuktaṃ ,
SA19n1286:445: ātmānaṃ nityaṃ paśyata eva sukhābhikāṅkṣaṇādisukhaheturātmīyaḥ syāt |
SA19n1286:451: tasmājjīvaccharīre satyapi avidyāvirahāt sarvasaṅgavirahalakṣaṇā muktirvītarāgāṇāṃ bhavatīti sarvaṃ susthitam |
SA19n1286:454: tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo boddhavyaḥ |
SA19n1286:456: etenaitaduktaṃ bhavati- ghaṭādirudakādyāharaṇasamartho deśakālākāraniyataḥ puraḥ prakāśamāno'nityatvādyanekadharmāntarodāsīnaḥ pravṛttiviṣayaḥ sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttaḥ svalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ |
SA19n1286:458: nanu yadi svalakṣaṇameva pratyakṣasya viṣayo na sāmānyaṃ tadānīṃ dhūmadahanasāmānyayorvyāptiḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyatām ?
SA19n1286:461: na tvanyayogavyavacchedena svalakṣaṇameva tasya viṣaya iti |
SA19n1286:465: tatra pratyakṣasya pratibhāsamānaṃ svalakṣaṇam eko grāhyaḥ |
SA19n1286:469: tatraikasyāmeva ghaṭādivyaktau sajātīyavyāvṛttāyāmanekakṣaṇasamudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ ūrdhvatālakṣaṇaṃ sādhanapratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ |
SA19n1286:473: pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayapratipādane paroktāḥ ṣaṭ padārthā na viṣayā ityuktam yathā - avayavidravyaṃ ,
SA19n1286:482: tathā hi - ghaṭādau paridṛśyamāne pūrvāparādibhāgaṃ vihāya nānyatkiñcidekamavayavidravyamupalabhāmahe |
SA19n1286:484: bhāgā eva hi bhāsante sanniviṣṭāstathā tathā |
SA19n1286:488: nanu pramitirupāṃ kriyāṃ phalabhūtāṃ niṣpādayajjñānaṃ pramāṇamiti prasiddham |
SA19n1286:498: etacca vikalpapratyayena bhinnaṃ vyavasthāpyate paramārthatastu nāstyeva bhedaḥ | yathoktam -
SA19n1286:503: tadā'nākāratvena sarvatra viṣaye tulyatvāt vibhāgena viṣayavyavasthā na sidhyati |
SA19n1286:504: yatpunaḥ kecidāhuḥ-pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ uttaraṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalamiti ,
SA19n1286:506: tathā hi prathamakṣaṇabhāvi tāvajjñānaṃ pramāṇaphalabhūtasya dvitīyajñānasyānutpatteḥ ,
SA19n1286:507: phalabhūtajñānotpattau ca pūrvasya kṣaṇikatvena vināśāt kathaṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati ?
